name: IpObserver
brief:
Observer design pattern implementation for change notification

Implements Subject/Observer pattern for automatic cache invalidation.
TaggedObjects (vectors, matrices) act as Subjects; dependent computed
quantities (CachedResults) act as Observers. When a Subject changes,
all attached Observers are notified to invalidate their cached values.

Notification types:
- NT_Changed: Subject data has been modified
- NT_BeingDestroyed: Subject is being deleted
- NT_All: Receive all notification types
